## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b04b33fa38a07736307a011b99bada5213399f1d9a84780fde87d35379149bf1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'artifact-lab-3-package-392c6acd' @ 0.1.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
